definitions.text: mark by some ceremony or observation
examples: The citizens mark the anniversary of the revolution with a march and a parade

definitions.text: call to remembrance; keep alive the memory of someone or something, as in a ceremony
examples: We remembered the 50th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz
Remember the dead of the First World War

definitions.text: be or provide a memorial to a person or an event
examples: This sculpture commemorates the victims of the concentration camps
